document.full_text: at 51, jim whitesell ' the solid, highly respected men's basketball coach at loyola ' thought he would be around to stay, but the new athletics director had other ideas.
document.title: sports: the coach is upbeat, winning and fired
lines_and_colors: at 51, jim whitesell ' the solid, highly respected men's basketball coach at loyola ' thought he would be around to stay, but the new athletics director had other ideas.
